testcase.name: POST_FORM / When requested with some html with a correct Accept request header, it returns a pdf file a plain response body works
POST_FORM / When omitting the Accept header, it defaults to application/pdf since this is the most used scenario works
POST_FORM / When specifying an attachment name, it sets a Content-Disposition response header to force the browser to download. works
POST_FORM / When specifying an unsupported Accept header, it fails with a 415. works
